game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Explore the ancient temple and retrieve a powerful artifact.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about an ancient temple deep in the jungle, said to contain powerful artifacts from a lost civilization. Your mission is to explore the temple, navigate its deadly traps, and retrieve one of these artifacts for further study.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the temple.
task.description: The entrance is said to be hidden behind a waterfall. Be careful of any wildlife and rival treasure hunters.

task.objective: Navigate through the temple's first chamber.
task.description: This room is filled with deadly traps and puzzles. Solve them to unlock the door to the next chamber.

task.objective: Rerieve the artifact from the treasure room.
task.description: The treasure room is filled with precious artifacts and gold. However, it's also heavily guarded by traps and magical wards.
